input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Show Chrome Accessories 21-334 Highway Round Rail Peg System

Item keywords:
Fits Universal 1-1/4 inch Highway Bars
Works with Show Chrome Accessories Highway Bars
Chrome Finished Round Rail Style Peg Design
Sold as a Pair
input_text.Response A: The billet aluminum Highway Clamp with Rail Peg has a pivoting foot peg for folding the pegs out of the way when they are not in use. Fits Show Chrome Accessories Highway Bars, OEM and aftermarket 1-1/4 inch Highway Bars/Engine Guards.
input_text.Response B: The Show Chrome Accessories 21-334 Highway Round Rail Peg System is a great way to add style and functionality to your motorcycle.  These highway pegs feature a durable chrome finish and a stylish round rail design, and they install easily on most motorcycle highway bars.  They also include rubber grip pads for added comfort, and they're sold as a pair.  These highway pegs are a great way to increase the comfort and functionality of your motorcycle, and they're sure to turn heads with their stylish design.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is quite specific but doesn't fit all the criteria, B is a little more wordy and vague but seems to cover all the items requested.
